TopicTitle: Help me find this TV advert

Articles.Content:
Hi guys,

I saw this advert on TV (I forget the channel) a few days ago and I've been trying to find it for the last couple of days, without any luck.

I think it's an advert for Lexus (it may have been another car brand) where the narrator of the advert mentions something along the lines of "It has been said XX% of all our communication is non-verbal..."

Can someone please help me find this advert?

I hope I'm posting this in the right place

Thanks!
